I would appreciate if it came with a pump because it would be much more accessible for me to use regularly. product_title: Cedar Citrus Full Spectrum CBD Balm

review_content:
I bought a small tin of the cedar citrus balm to try it and I’m so glad I did. I’m in the process of making up another order already and the large cedar citrus tin is already in my cart. So are two small tins of the other two scents to try.

I like how fast this balm starts working. Also. I like how non-greasy it feels about 5 min after you rub it in. I have tried topical CBD “ointment” types of rubs from other manufacturers, the kind that have the consistency and greasiness of petroleum jelly. This balm is not like that. I rub it in and let it set on my skin for several minutes. After that I rub it in again, and get dressed. My clothes don’t stick to my skin, and my skin feels moisturized but not sticky.

I hope I like the other two scents. I’m eager to try them.

I would describe the scent as LOTS of orange with a little bit of cedar. It’s quite nice.

review_content: I was thrilled to see the addition of lotion, rather than the balm which I’d been using. I love the balms but wanted something lighter, particularly during this time of fervent hand washing. After phoning Lazarus and speaking to a nice young man, he told me his opinion of the Pine scent was overwhelming. But he encouraged me to try them out and I decided to get the sampler. I LOVE the pine! My favorite of the 2 scents. Yes, it’s quite strong. However, the scent is true. It lingers on the air for sometime which I actually love. I’m an avid outdoor gal who can’t go camping right now so I appreciate this scent. The rose for me was a disappointment. I adore the true scent of the rose balm but that was lacking in the lotion. The scent is quite subdued but additionally, it just didn’t seem as true a rose scent as the balm. The dry-down was fast and left a fake smell…like many commercial skin lotions. All lotions are silky, absorb well and have no greasy residue. They make my skin very soft. I will inform them about my experience with the rose. I would DEFINITELY order these again and keep on hand! The sample box contained 3, 1 Oz tubes, perfect for my purse. Thanks, Lazarus!
product_title: Full Spectrum CBD Lotions Bundle

I tend to use this right after I shower and before I go to sleep – it’s the perfect calming agent.

review_content: I really love how quickly this lotion goes to work, and I never use more than a half teaspoon because the consistency is so perfect, a little goes a long way. I am a retired esthetician and I still really expect a product to perform well. This does on every level. So effective at soothing all my aches, relaxing my mind while restoring a sense lasting feeling of balance. If your on the fence about trying this, don’t hesitate I bought the smaller tube, and came back for the largest, I won’t be caught without it. It would be great to have a small refillable purse or pocket size refillable. Thanks for much to the Lazarus team for always wanting to improve. Your assistance program helps me to not be as inactive as I was becoming without breaking the bank. I really wouldn’t be able to afford without it. I could give 5 stars if the applicator opening was half the size making it less messy.

review_content:
An extraordinary and wonderful product, I love it. I had first tried the Mint which works beautifully for me and the Portland Rose scent intrigued me enough to give it a try. As an old school wet shaver (shaving with a straight blade or “cut throat” razor) I’ve discovered over the years that “Rose” is a much sought after and prized scent for the finest and oldest brands of shave creams and related products.

So to the gentleman especially: Have no fear of smelling like Granny, I can assure you the scent isn’t over powering whatsoever — it’s fresh and intoxicating.

The Balms are effortless to use making it easy to pin point specific areas both large and small. Although quite dense the product both liquefies and is absorbed easily and quickly. I also love the apothecary type tins with screw on tops. Simply a wonderful product with an equally wonderful scent – Thank You Lazarus!
product_title: Portland Rose Full Spectrum CBD Balm

review_content: This balm works nicely. A calming effect to aching hands and feet. The portland rose scent is intoxicating. I don’t like all rose scents it can come off synthetic and headache inducing. Not this rose scent. It is therapeutic for me. I dread the day I cannot get this balm in portland rose.

review_content:
An extraordinary and wonderful product, I love it. I had first tried the Mint which works beautifully for me and the Portland Rose scent intrigued me enough to give it a try. As an old school wet shaver (shaving with a straight blade or “cut throat” razor) I’ve discovered over the years that “Rose” is a much sought after and prized scent for the finest and oldest brands of shave creams and related products.

So to the gentleman especially: Have no fear of smelling like Granny, I can assure you the scent isn’t over powering whatsoever — it’s fresh and intoxicating.

The Balms are effortless to use making it easy to pin point specific areas both large and small. Although quite dense the product both liquefies and is absorbed easily and quickly. I also love the apothecary type tins with screw on tops. Simply a wonderful product with an equally wonderful scent – Thank You Lazarus!
product_title: Portland Rose Full Spectrum CBD Balm

review_content: This balm works nicely. A calming effect to aching hands and feet. The portland rose scent is intoxicating. This is the most wonderful product. The rose scent takes me back to being a young girl playing anywhere in my grandparent’s property you would smell the soft warm scent of the Rose’s planted. My Grandma favored the old fashioned (& now impossible to find) rose bushes featuring blooms the size of a large man’s hand. It goes on so easily, no residue, and does much better job for me. I no longer have to give up crafting & do not need the braces for thumbs to create.
I, too, would love to see lavender or the light fragrance of honeysuckle.
Big THANKS to customer service dept. They went above & beyond anything you could hope for, let alone expect. You are the BEST!!

review_content: I am so thankful for Lazarus Naturals topical CBD, these have been a lifesaver during lockdown when I can’t see a massage therapist. Very torn on lotion vs. the balm. The rose scent in the lotion is so disappointing compared to the rose balm. The lotion starts working much faster, but feels weaker in some way? Not sure how to describe it exactly but I have to apply it more frequently than the balm on bad days. Both make my skin break out, but the lotion causes small pimples rather than the monsters the balm left in it’s wake so a win for the lotion there- ha! The relief I get is worth the breakouts but would also love a non-comedogenic option. Been buying small sizes and just can’t decide which one to invest in the large size of since there are pros and cons to each!
product_title: Portland Rose Full Spectrum CBD Lotion

review_content: The lotion works great but the smell is way to overpowering. The smell also doesn’t go away for awhile. Great lotion but I don’t recommend getting a scented one…
product_title: Portland Rose Full Spectrum CBD Lotion

review_content: I’ve been waiting for this. I’m so happy. Love it. I bought this and the pine. There both amazing. Worth the wait. It goes on so much easier, like it works faster to me. I can’t say enough good about the people that work there are always happy helpful great when I have to call. Ty. For caring about customer. Not easy to find people like u anymore. Love u guys and products. Customer forever. Is there someone to write a thank you letter to? I just want to do more for all u do for other. There so many people you help with the assistance program. I was able to wean my pain meds to half cause of cbd. And if not for your price I couldn’t afford it. I owe u big. Ty.

review_content: First, let me say I ordered the small size to try and will be ordering more. The reason I gave this 4 stars is because it doesn’t smell very good going on. It has a very earthy smell out of the bottle. But give it a minute or two and the bad smell disappears and you are left with a light rose scent. I’m a soap maker and although I know this doesn’t use pure rose essential oil, it is still a very nice scent. Pure rose essential oil is outrageously expensive for those that don’t know. Overall I’m happy with this product and will order again. I also gain the benefit of the CBD, so I feel this topical works very well. Would love a lavender scent to come out in the future.

review_content:
This Balm is nothing short of Brilliant. It’s the ideal marriage between cooling menthol and the intense heat of Capsaician (the stuff that makes peppers hot) which I never knew until Julie at Lazarus told me while I was asking her questions about the Balms, she recommended this one for those very reasons and I can’t thank her enough — it’s been a life saver.

Top quality ingredients too, mango butter, pure and organic bees wax, that wonderful hot stuff I can’t spell or pronounce, Menthol, wintergreen oil and so much more!

The texture is dense and grainy at first but when you liquefy it with your body heat it’s luxurious, non greasy, has pleasant sent and is just simply divine — I love it because it works. I just bought the Rose because the scent sounds so intoxicating. The Pharmaceutical Industry could learn a thing or two from Lazarus Naturals, but they won’t – too much greed. I applaud Lazarus Naturals for their Industry leading Assistance Program that makes it possible for folks like me to benefit from these incredible life changing products.

review_content: Received mine yesterday. To anybody worried about whether or not it will be gritty or smooth, it’s important to understand how beeswax reacts to the cold. In general, beeswax tends to become harder in colder climates so keeping it at room temperature will keep the consistency great.

review_content: If you have a bad spot and want to concentrate the dose of CBD there, this balm is the way to go. The massage oil is, well runny, so harder to focus. The balm, being thicker, is easier to work into the same target, while the oil is better for a broader application. For me the thickness is just right – after 3-4 seconds of rubbing, complete absorption. I found only the smidgen that was on the cap as being gritty, otherwise it’s pretty consistent inside the tin. Frankly, I care more about content than texture. If you want a smooth cream, go to BodyShop. For concentrated CBD remedy, get this stuff.

review_content: I received the product on a very hot day. It was liquid in consistency, which was runny. However, in my house (room temp) it has solidified into a pretty hard, wax-type substance that I have to really dig into with my fingers to get enough product in order to apply it to my shoulder. Is that change of consistency normal?
product_title: CBD Coconut Oil

review_content: Yes, this change of consistency is normal. Coconut oil has a melting point around 70 degrees Fahrenheit, so it is not unusual for it to switch between liquid and solid. However, CBD doesn’t begin to degrade until temperatures above 300 degrees Fahrenheit, so the change in temperature should not affect the potency of your coconut oil.
product_title: CBD Coconut Oil

product_title: RSO CBD Oil

review_content: Yes, it is safe to do so as CBD is still stable even at very high temperatures. Some people like to infuse their entire coffee with CBD. We wrote a blog article on the subject if you want to learn more! https://www.lazarusnaturals.com/blog/cbd-coffee
product_title: RSO CBD Oil

review_content:
On day one but looking forward to whats to come.

Can you mix in your coffee?
product_title: RSO CBD Oil

review_content:
You can add RSO to your coffee. CBD coffee is a pretty common practice, but the two won’t mix naturally on their own. CBD is not water soluble, that is why all of our tinctures use an oil carrier as a base. The best way to combine the two is to use a blender and add other fats like cream or butter. We wrote an article on the subject if you would like to learn more.

https://www.lazarusnaturals.com/blog/cbd-coffee

review_content: I prefer the full spectrum, but I take this in the daytime because sometimes full spectrum makes me sleepy (I take full spectrum at night). This stacks up well with other companies’ isolates: it has a much higher potency than anybody else’s isolate and is cheaper per mg! Yeah, this company makes the best product at the cheapest price, and I love their social conscience. Even their packing materials reflect their values—packing peanuts, made from biodegradable starch, that melt when you pour water over them! If anything, this isolate is slightly sweet—a completely natural flavor, as there is no sugar in it. (Oh, I happen to think water is sweet, so maybe my version of flavorless is sweet.) I really like the fractionated coconut oil base, which also tastes fresher and is lighter than an olive oil base. It took me awhile to find Lazarus Naturals, but now I buy CBD products solely from them. Lastly, I t’s really important to me that they publish third party labs, and I think it’s wise to buy CBD that comes from a state that regulates it, like Oregon. It works!

review_content:
I can only add my enthusiastic approval to all the other reviews. I take this 3 times a day. I take it just before going to be and it allows me to sleep right through the night. I am old, 77. I have the usual aches and pains that come with age. This product improves my quality of life a lot.

I should note that I have purchased CBD oil from another vendor. It worked fine for me for a couple of years. Then they started watering their product to get more profit from each sale. It was a stupid thing to do. They poisoned the well forever for me. Paying the same price and getting 50 percent of of the advertised amount of CBD oil should be illegal and it sure is reckless of them to do that for quick profit. Their name starts with E and they had a good reputation. They refused to answer any of my emails about this problem. Lazarus has been independently tested and lives up to their listed concentration of CBD oil. It tastes terrible and I don’t care. It really improves my quality of life in my old age. I hope Lazarus continues to sell high quality products as they are now.

BTW, independent testing show that most CBD oil sold from brick and mortar stores has very little or zero CBD oil. Mostly zero. We are lucky to have a reputable source for our CBD needs. I am grateful.

review_content: Hi Diane, we wanted to give some feedback on this subject. Our products are made from hemp which is naturally low in THC, however, they do contain federally acceptable levels of THC. Our full spectrum products contain up to 0.3% THC by weight. Our isolate based tinctures have an undetectable level of THC per our testing standards. However, we do not recommend CBD products for those who are worried about drug testing as there are many shared compounds between hemp and marijuana that could cause a false positive.

review_content: Hi Stephen, this is something we are currently working on. The difficulty with full spectrum products is that the terpenes and plant matter which people attribute benefits to, also bring with them the essential flavors of hemp. We have designed two new full spectrum flavors (french vanilla mocha and chocolate mint) which mask the hemp flavor, but it will be a few months until we have ramped up the production necessary to support these products.

It was a stupid thing to do. They poisoned the well forever for me. Paying the same price and getting 50 percent of of the advertised amount of CBD oil should be illegal and it sure is reckless of them to do that for quick profit. Their name starts with E and they had a good reputation. They refused to answer any of my emails about this problem. Lazarus has been independently tested and lives up to their listed concentration of CBD oil. It tastes terrible and I don’t care. It really improves my quality of life in my old age. I hope Lazarus continues to sell high quality products as they are now.

Everyone’s CBD needs are different, so we recommend starting small and working your way up as needed. 15-25mg of CBD is a good size to start. In general, we recommend measuring in mg of CBD rather than drops, as it is a more accurate measurement system that can be applied to any CBD tincture. review_content:
First and only CBD that worked for me. For the past year I’ve tried at least half a dozen different brands of CBD, and the 2018 Lazarus high potency CBD and RSO isolate. None of them worked at all, and the previous unflavored versions of Lazarus CBD oil and RSO tasted fishy at best, missing that distinctive and pleasant hempy flavor.

After spending a few hundred dollars for various brands of CBD and getting no results, I was reluctant to buy it again. I was on the fence about buying CBD again. But a few months ago Lazarus Naturals emailed customers promising improved flavor and quality. Decided to give it another try since Lazarus increased its already generous veteran discount.

This time it really worked. I bought a larger 60 ml/3000 mg container of the high potency chocolate mint and another 10ml container of RSO. As before the RSO did nothing for me. But the chocolate mint high potency CBD has a very definite, unmistakable effect.

The chocolate mint high potency really works. 1/2 to 1 ml in coffee first thing in the day and continues to improve in effect over the next few hours. And it tastes much better, with a more pleasant hempy flavor and subtle mint flavor.

I just ordered another large container for myself and sampler pack of the high potency CBD. I don’t know what you did to improve its product but this particular variety is really effective. And my thanks for the generous veterans discount.
product_title: Chocolate Mint Flavored High Potency Full Spectrum CBD Tincture

review_content: I wasn’t aware of this brand until my friend told me about it. I was in Canada for the entire summer, and with their medicinal laws, I was able to get anything I needed. After coming back home to the U.S., I did not qualify for a MMJ Card. I tried her tincture, put into gelatin capsules, and was blown away. This product is super calming, and I have never slept better. I was a pro athlete for 11 years and with that comes various aches and pains from the training I still do. I immediately take 100mg as soon as I get home from the gym, and within a couple hours I am feeling great physically and mentally. I have noticed that some batches of the same flavor have varying effects, although I am not sure if there are other factors causing that.
product_title: Chocolate Mint Flavored High Potency Full Spectrum CBD Tincture

review_content: This is my favorite CBD so far! I’m not a big cannabis user, though I used to be, now I am hyper sensitive to it! I’m going to try and update after I’ve used it for a week or so, so I can have a decent amount of time to see if it works. Also, this was scheduled to be delivered tomorrow, but it came a day early and I’m extremely pleased with that. On top of all of that, the packaging, IMO, was very environmentally friendly! review_content:
I started using CBD two years ago and my experiences are unbelievable.
I started using CBD from another supplier. I started with 0.25ml twice daily and it started working for me within 1/2 hr. (And I’ll explain more about the results later.) However, it was extremely expensive and soon reached the limits of my budget so I started looking for another supplier. I went to every educational opportunity I could find to better understand how this product works in a human. I went to a local retailer and reviewed all the products they sold then I went home and spent three days on the www going through their information about their products. It was mind boggling as no one was reporting the same information type, mostly sales information, until I went to Lazarus Naturals. Their information and testing info was so clear and understandable I couldn’t believe it. Well my mind was made up so I went back to my local supplier and purchased my first bottle, and they gave me a good senior or veteran discount.
After I was almost completed with my 1st bottle I went back on the Lazarus web site and created my account and purchased my 2nd bottle directly from the supplier. I spent a lot more time on their web site and reviewed their veterans, low income, and disability discount information, WOW, couldn’t believe their position regarding vets. Please keep in mind when I got out of the service in 1972 you never wore your uniform in public and on the east coast there were signs on lawns stating Dogs and servicemen keep off the grass. Any way I submitted my service discharge records via email on a Saturday and received my discount approval on Monday, what great service unheard of from most suppliers. So with the vet discount I was able to afford to continue using CBD oil on a daily basis.
I use 1fl oz. 2 times per day and I couldn’t be happier. I discussed my results with my Doctor and he was so impressed he asked me for all the info on the Lazarus web site. Between the two of us we have recommended at least 75 people to at least try this. We have both gotten lots of positive feedback. My last words are way to go Lazarus Naturals for your great products and customer service.
product_title: French Vanilla Mocha Flavored High Potency Full Spectrum CBD Tincture
